title: Executive Order 6215-Amendment of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: Paragraph 6, Subdivision VI, of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended to read:
All positions in the Division of Investigation except fingerprint classifiers.
This Order will be effective on the effective date of Section 3 of Executive Order No. 6166, dated June 10, 1933.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6215-Amendment of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362038
